hero.title: BAO Agent
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered Small Business Administrative Operations Platform
hero.description: Democratizing small business administrative operations through intelligent automation. We bridge the generational knowledge gap between aging business owners and young operators, using AI agents to transform manual, repetitive workflows into efficient, scalable operations.

scheduling.title: Automated Customer Scheduling
scheduling.description: Our AI agent handles appointment booking via text, phone calls, and email, plus sends periodic scheduling reminders to keep customers engaged.

staffing.title: Intelligent Staffing & Resource Management
staffing.description: Automatically schedules personnel and equipment based on time availability, location proximity, and skill requirements for optimal efficiency.

billing.title: Seamless Billing & Collections
billing.description: Handles invoice generation, payment collection, and automated follow-up via multiple channels (text, phone, email) with escalation protocols for overdue accounts.

analytics.title: Comprehensive Business Analytics
analytics.description: Provides real-time insights on customer patterns, revenue trends, operational efficiency, and predictive analytics to drive strategic decision-making and growth opportunities.
